ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.INFO: Welcome to my site :) I am very interested in software development and am ready for any challenges that await me on this journey. As a former warehouse logistics specialist, I got to know teamwork and independent work well and take this experience with me into software development. If I can convince you with my current performance, I would look forward to being invited to an interview.
ABOUT_ME.LIGHTBUL: I live in Wendelstein (Bavaria), I am 30 years old and would like to learn and implement new things :)
ABOUT_ME.PUZZLE: I hope I can convince you with my skills that I am capable of taking on new challenges

SKILLS.HEADLINE: Skills
SKILLS.INFO: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

PORTFOLIO.INFO: This page is a sample of my work! scroll down to view other projects I have develped.
PORTFOLIO.JOIN_INFO: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PORTFOLIO.LOCO_INFO: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact
CONTACT.QUESTION: Got a problem to solve?
CONTACT.INFO: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

FORM.TEXT2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
